item.title: Java中的super和this关键字
item.description: suoer关键字用法一： class Person{ public int c; private String name; private int age; protected void setName(String name){ this.name=name; } protected void setAge(int age){ this.age=age; } protected void print(){ System.out.println("Name="+name+" Age="+age); } } public class DemoSuper extends Person{ //继承Person public void print(){ System.out.println("DemoSuper:"); super.print(); //虽然本方法重
